text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 50.1. Qaaf bohat bari shan walay iss quran ki qasam 50.2. bulkay enhen tajjub maloom hua kay inn kay pass inhi mein say aik aagah kerney wala aaya to kafiron ney kaha kay yeh aik ajeeb cheez hai 50.3. kiya jabb hum mar ker mitti hojayen gay phir yeh wapsi door (az aqal) hai 50.4. Zamin jo kuch inn mein say ghatati hai who humen maloom hai aur humaray pass sabb yaad rakhnay waali kitab hai
